column1: I respectfully ask Mr. Gayner and Ms. Laulis to stop diluting and get a repurchase plan going. Strategically, and WACC-wise, I get it, but enough is enough. With a BB rating, just below investment grade, it’s worth carrying more debt on the balance sheet.I don’t mind the most recent offering or preceding offerings, with very minor (< 5%) dilution, but it would be nice to scrap the dividend and approve a buyback.
